results.subject: Great Service!
results.message: Had an amazing experience with the chef. Food was delicious!

results.subject: Delivery Delay
results.message: My order was delayed by 30 minutes
results.response: We apologize for the delay. We've credited your account with a discount for your next order.

results.subject: Menu Suggestion
results.message: Would love to see more vegetarian options
results.response: Thank you for your suggestion. We're working on expanding our vegetarian menu.

Dear {customer_name},

Your order #{order_id} has been confirmed and is being prepared.

Thank you for choosing our service!
